question.title: Unknown lifecycle phase ".version". You must specify a valid lifecycle phase or a goal: Maven
question.body:
I am writing a workflow file for CI/CD with GitHub actions. For building the Docker image, I need the project version from the pom.xml, as done here- https://youtu.be/UtEHSngmdHA?t=6741 and as done in the extract version action of the build-image phase- https://github.com/ali-bouali/book-social-network/blob/ci/pipeline/.github/workflows/pipeline-backend.yml.

Similarly, I wrote a workflow file stage-

 build-image:
    runs-on: ubuntu
    name: Build Docker Image
    needs: build #-build-image step must run after build
    steps:
      - name: Checkout code
        uses: actions/checkout@v4 
        with: 
          fetch-depth: 0 
      - name: Setup JDK
        uses: actions/setup-jdk@v4
        with: 
          java-version: '21' 
          distribution: 'corretto'
      - name: Extract project version
        id: extract_version #-give id to be used later
        run: |
          cd examsoft
          echo "VERSION=$(./mvnw -q -Dexec.executable='echo' -Dexec.args='${project.version}' --non-recursive exec:exec)" >> $GITHUB_OUTPUT

But, the command-

./mvnw -q -Dexec.executable='echo' -Dexec.args='${project.version}' --non-recursive exec:exec

Is giving me an error-

[ERROR] Unknown lifecycle phase ".executable=echo". You must specify a valid lifecycle phase or a goal in the format <plugin-prefix>:<goal> or <plugin-group-id>:<plugin-artifact-id>[:<plugin-version>]:<goal>. Available lifecycle phases are: pre-clean, clean, post-clean, validate, initialize, generate-sources, process-sources, generate-resources, process-resources, compile, process-classes, generate-test-sources, process-test-sources, generate-test-resources, process-test-resources, test-compile, process-test-classes, test, prepare-package, package, pre-integration-test, integration-test, post-integration-test, verify, install, deploy, pre-site, site, post-site, site-deploy. -> [Help 1]
[ERROR] 
[ERROR] To see the full stack trace of the errors, re-run Maven with the -e switch.
[ERROR] Re-run Maven using the -X switch to enable full debug logging.
[ERROR]
[ERROR] For more information about the errors and possible solutions, please read the following articles:
[ERROR] [Help 1] http://cwiki.apache.org/confluence/display/MAVEN/LifecyclePhaseNotFoundException

I am using Java 21 and Maven version 3.9.5. My project's pom.xml is-

<?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?>
<project xmlns="http://maven.apache.org/POM/4.0.0" xmlns:xsi="http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema-instance"
    xsi:schemaLocation="http://maven.apache.org/POM/4.0.0 https://maven.apache.org/xsd/maven-4.0.0.xsd">
    <modelVersion>4.0.0</modelVersion>
    <parent>
        <groupId>org.springframework.boot</groupId>
        <artifactId>spring-boot-starter-parent</artifactId>
        <version>3.2.3</version>
        <relativePath/> <!-- lookup parent from repository -->
    </parent>
    <groupId>com.examsoft</groupId>
    <artifactId>examsoft</artifactId>
    <version>1.0.0</version>
    <name>examsoft</name>
    <description>Demo project for Spring Boot</description>
    <properties>
        <java.version>21</java.version>
    </properties>
    <profiles>
        <profile>
            <id>dev</id>
            <dependencies>
                <dependency>
                    <groupId>com.mysql</groupId>
                    <artifactId>mysql-connector-j</artifactId>
                    <scope>runtime</scope>
                </dependency>
            </dependencies>
        </profile>
        <profile>
            <id>prod</id>
            <dependencies>
                <dependency>
                    <groupId>com.mysql</groupId>
                    <artifactId>mysql-connector-j</artifactId>
                    <scope>runtime</scope>
                </dependency>
            </dependencies>
        </profile>
        <profile>
            <id>prod2</id>
            <dependencies>
                <dependency>
                    <groupId>org.postgresql</groupId>
                    <artifactId>postgresql</artifactId>
                    <version>42.7.3</version>
                </dependency>
            </dependencies>
        </profile>
    </profiles>
    <dependencies>
        <dependency>
            <groupId>org.springframework.boot</groupId>
            <artifactId>spring-boot-starter-data-jpa</artifactId>
        </dependency>
        <dependency>
            <groupId>org.springframework.boot</groupId>
            <artifactId>spring-boot-starter-web</artifactId>
        </dependency>

        <dependency>
            <groupId>org.springframework.boot</groupId>
            <artifactId>spring-boot-devtools</artifactId>
            <scope>runtime</scope>
            <optional>true</optional>
        </dependency>
        <dependency>
            <groupId>org.projectlombok</groupId>
            <artifactId>lombok</artifactId>
            <optional>true</optional>
        </dependency>
        <dependency>
            <groupId>org.springframework.boot</groupId>
            <artifactId>spring-boot-starter-test</artifactId>
            <scope>test</scope>
        </dependency>
    </dependencies>
    <build>
        <plugins>
            <plugin>
                <groupId>org.springframework.boot</groupId>
                <artifactId>spring-boot-maven-plugin</artifactId>
                <configuration>
                    <excludes>
                        <exclude>
                            <groupId>org.projectlombok</groupId>
                            <artifactId>lombok</artifactId>
                        </exclude>
                    </excludes>
                </configuration>
            </plugin>
        </plugins>

    </build>

</project>
